author: samir tewari
text: Rishi Kapoor sir. I cannot imagine my teens without your movies. You were the hero all of us loved. Two days, two stalwarts. My heart is broken. Rest in peace sir. You are in a better place.

author: samir tewari
text: Rest in peace Irrfan Khan. Always wanted to work with you but didn’t. You are a fighter, and you fought till the end. My condolences to your family. Om Shanti. May you light up the heavens with your fabulous performances now.

author: samir tewari
text: Even I absolutely hate cutting trees but frankly all this protesting should have been done way earlier. And I believ they are all going to be replanted anyway. And this cannot handle another year of traffic torture.

author: samir tewari
text: I feel there should be a waiting period before every project starts which is the official speak now or be quiet forever period. In this period people can question and suggest changes. Not once things are at a finishing point. This is pure agenda based politics.

author: samir tewari
text: Not to mention the bad air quality in the city because of so many cars out on the roads, stuck in jams, burning fuel in zillions of litrs everyday. Why do people wake up when things reach a point of no return? https://t.co/VqOfoLLdqq
